column2: The Realm has merchants trading resources.
This province is laden with quality deposits of building materials.
This province is laden with many elephants producing quality ivory.
This province is laden with high quality iron veins.
This province is highly fertile and produces excessive quantities of food.
This province is laden with gold and silver veins.
The region is rich in stone and wood, these master crafters will cut and shape them into building supplies.
The region is rich in iron, these mines will dig the useful ore from the ground.
The region is Rich in gold and silver, these mines will dig the precious ore from the ground.
The Realm deals in resources, and with trade comes merchants, this building is their meeting ground, granting the holder a nice boon.

The region is Rich in gold and silver, these mines will dig the precious ore from the ground.

Send out surveys to prospect [Root.GetName] for resources.
